m_szDocTitle: Boeing, SpaceX win contracts to build space taxis for Nasa - Livemint
m_szDocSumamry: Last Modified: Wed, Sep 17 2014. 09 38 AM IST Boeing, SpaceX win contracts to build space taxis for Nasa The contract ends US dependence on Russia for flying astronauts commercially Irene Klotz Andrea Shalal Nasa awarded Boeing and SpaceX with contracts valued at a combined $6.8 billion to develop, certify and fly their seven-person capsules. Photo: AFP Cape Canaveral/Washington: Nasa will partner with Boeing Co. and Space Exploration Technologies Corp. ( SpaceX ) to build commercially owned and operated “space taxis” to fly astronauts to the International Space Station, ending US dependence o
